1.title: Hot-Headed Owners

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Jon Taffer returns to bars with the most hot-headed owners, including Solids & Stripes and Corporate Bar & Grill aka Piratz Tavern, to judge whether they continued to succeed or fail without him.

2.title: Delusional Owners

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Bars with the most delusional owners are revisited by Jon Taffer to judge whether they continued to succeed or fail without him, including former hookah bar Taza and Metal and Lace.

3.title: Stubborn Owners

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Bars with the most stubborn owners are revisited by Jon Taffer as he judges whether they continued to succeed or fail without him, including walk-out bar O'Face and Spirits on Bourbon.

4.title: Flying Fists and Bar Brawls

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

5.title: Disasters of Epic Proportions

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Taffer revisits 3 bars whose fortunes have turned for the worse after disasters have ravaged their futures, from the apocalypse themed bar The End to Chicago landmark The Abbey. Can Taffer develop a plan to help them get back on their feet?

1.title: No Laughing Matter

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Taffer revisits Jack's Fire Department to see if the McGowan brothers have cooled their fiery relationship, and its no joke when he takes on an angry stand up comedy club owner from Scottsdale.

2.title: Meathead-To-Head

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Taffer revisits the Dirty Rooster and ruffles the feathers of owner Rob, and mediates a muscle-bound dispute between two rival bar owners from Houston, Texas.

3.title: Empty Pockets

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Taffer revisits MT Bottle to find out if they still have empty pockets, and puts a fork in a gravy dispute. The owners of Piratz return once again and the Bar Rescue's most stubborn owner plays out the show.

4.title: The Luck of the Irish

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Taffer reveals his most successful Bar Rescue ever, tests the post-rescue luck of Campbell's Irish pub and revisits The Lister - home of the infamous "porn couch."

5.title: Drunky McDrunkerton Returns

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Biker-gloves are off as Taffer confronts the leopard-print lovin' ladies of The Handlebar, while Janet Jackson-playing bartender Brandon, plate-throwing Ami, and The Brixton owner Tim return.

1.title: Brick & Barley Above Water

episode of.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Taffer confronts AJ from Brick & Barley over her blistering attitude and the civil strife with her daughters over the bar's uniforms while a combative owner comes clean about the failure of his bar after the rescue.

imdb.plot outline: "Bar Rescue" heads "Back to the Bar" to check up on some of Jon Taffer's most challenging rescues. This "where are they now" special features never before seen footage of what happened after the "Bar Rescue" cameras left town. Taffer and his team follow the revisited bars through an evening shift, re-inspect the facilities for cleanliness and answer the question on every "Bar Rescue" fan's mind: "did they follow Jon's advice or not?"
imdb.title: Bar Rescue: Back to the Bar

"Bar Rescue" heads "Back to the Bar" to check up on some of Jon Taffer's most challenging rescues. This "where are they now" special features never before seen footage of what happened after the "Bar Rescue" cameras left town. Taffer and his team follow the revisited bars through an evening shift, re-inspect the facilities for cleanliness and answer the question on every "Bar Rescue" fan's mind: "did they follow Jon's advice or not?"::SPIKE PRESS
